E_Sentences.S_Insight: Briefly introduce the game and Joel Embiid's performance

Episode.E_Text: On March 17, 2022, the Philadelphia 76ers faced off against the Cleveland Cavaliers in a regular season NBA game, with the 76ers prevailing 118-114 over the Cavaliers. Joel Embiid played for 35 minutes and scored 37 points, shooting 13-19 and getting 17 rebounds and 5 assists to help his team secure the victory. Embiid's mid-range shooting played an important role in the game, helping the 76ers take the lead in the first half.

E_Sentences.S_Insight: Provide the total number of shots Joel Embiid attempted in the game
Mention the percentage of shots he made

Episode.E_Text: Joel Embiid attempted 19 shots in the game, and out of those 19 shots, he made 13 of them, resulting in a shooting percentage of 68.4%. The pie chart in the picture represents Embiid's shooting performance today.

E_Sentences.S_Insight: Break down the number of shots Joel Embiid took in each quarter
Highlight the quarter where he took the most shots

Episode.E_Text: Embiid was dominating in the first half, hitting nine out of eleven, probably the biggest reason for the 76ers 26-point lead. But that was because he was making most of his mid-range jumpers(6/8), which is not very sustainable. He only hit 3/9 in the second half, and none of his shots were near the rim!

Episode.E_Title: Distribution of Shots by Shot Type

Mention the percentage of shots he took from each type

S_Chartneed.Chart_Title: The Percentage of Shots from Each Type

Episode.E_Text: Jump shot is Embiid's primary shooting method, with 7 out of 11 attempts successful. Embiid's layups and dunks are very consistent and have a high success rate. As a center, Embiid has the ability to attack and shoot while holding the ball. In today's game, the mid-range shot was his main scoring method.
